body_html:
Thanks for your following up.

Have I written custom code?

Yes. See here.

OS/TF/CUDA/Bazel/GPU version

This seems to be irrelevant. I believe this error could be reproduced in most environments.
But for your reference, both of the following environments raised the error:

  • Windows 7 + Anaconda 4.2.0 64-bit (with Python 3.5.2) + TF 1.5.0 installed by pip install tensorflow + CPU
  • Ubuntu 16.04 LTS + Python 3.5.2 + TF 1.4.0-rc1 (probably built by Bazel 0.6.1) + CUDA 8.0.61 + GTX 1080 Ti

Exact command to reproduce

python att_seq2seq_minimal_error.py
Python 3 recommended.

body:
Thanks for your following up.
>Have I written custom code?

Yes. See [here](https://github.com/soloice/tf-tutorial/blob/master/src/att_seq2seq_minimal_error.py).

>OS/TF/CUDA/Bazel/GPU version

This seems to be irrelevant. I believe this error could be reproduced in most environments.
But for your reference, both of the following environments raised the error: 
- Windows 7 + Anaconda 4.2.0 64-bit (with Python 3.5.2) + TF 1.5.0 installed by `pip install tensorflow` + CPU
- Ubuntu 16.04 LTS + Python 3.5.2 + TF 1.4.0-rc1 (probably built by Bazel 0.6.1) + CUDA 8.0.61 + GTX 1080 Ti

>Exact command to reproduce

`python att_seq2seq_minimal_error.py`
Python 3 recommended.
